items.abstract: Short program Cyber Security and Warfare, Delft University of Technology, The Netherlands.
(2nd) PhD in Electrical Engineering, Mathematics, and Computer Science, University of Twente, The Netherlands. Topic: Affective Signal Processing (ASP): Unraveling the mystery of emotions.
(1st) PhD in Social Sciences, Radboud University Nijmegen, The Netherlands. Topic: Human-Centered Content-Based Image Retrieval.
MSc in Artificial Intelligence, Radboud University Nijmegen, The Netherlands.

functions.title: Present

functions.title: Past
